WorkItem.ClosedComment: Seems to be fixed in current version.
WorkItem.Description: The popouts which appear when selecting gear for a particular item slot will extend upwards outside of the viewable screen area.  This requires repositioning of the Rawr screen on the desktop in order to select items at the top of the list.  Some popouts will extend down, rather than up, if they are close enough to the top of the screen, but there are usually one or two item slots which will extend above the top of the screen.  The attached image is a screenshot of the upper-left portion of the desktop.  Screen resolution is 1280x800, Windows XP, Rawr Beta 9a.
WorkItem.Summary: Item Selection Popouts Extend Outside of Viewable Screen

Comments.Message: Well, currently, it'll try to extend downward... If it doesn't have enough room to extend downward, it'll extend up instead. On small screens like yours, it may not have room in either direction. Knowing that, ya should be able to work around it, until I can fix it so that it displays in the middle if it doesn't have room at the top either.
